name: Peppermint Mocha
description:
A holiday-themed game about crafting beverages for your customers. Take on the role of a café owner making delicious hot chocolates, coffees, and peppermint mocha lattes with various fixings!

Make drinks as fast as you can. The better you do, the less patient customers will become... But if you do well, the tips will increase!

This is v2.0 of a game I released a few months ago, Pumpkin Spice, with some new features such as:

  • Sound Effects
  • Improved UI
    • Display current drink cost on the top
    • Costs and profits are displayed at the click position
    • Customer orders are now visual
  • Customer Patience Meter
  • Difficulty Curve
  • New Ingredients & "Extra Topping"
  • New Customer Outfits
